title: Honour 5 question
body:
So reading the small part in the patch notes related to honour 5 and the chromas, it states that if you were honour 5 prior to patch 9.16 you'd get the 2 honour tokens.
Is this only for those that had it prior to 9.16 or will it still apply to those who hit honour 5 after 9.16?

replies.body:
So that note is for people who basically got nothing for hitting honour 5 this season because they hit it before the content was available. Once that content becomes available they will get their tokens. I believe it might be implying that if you got one of the skins from your capsule you'll only get one token, but it's not totally clear and I don't believe it applies to you from the sounds of things anyway.

This is the note that applies to everyone: 
>This season only, your Honor 5 capsule will contain two Honor 5 tokens because we promised you two chromas this season, not one.

So to be clear, once you hit Honour 5 this season you will receive 2 Honour 5 tokens. For future seasons you will only get one.
